alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Bexar; Comal; Kendall; Kerr; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Medina, eastern Bandera, southeastern Kerr, southwestern Kendall, northwestern Bexar and west central Comal Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 946 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nelson City, or near Boerne, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boerne, Bandera, Fair Oaks Ranch, Bulverde, Cross Mountain, Walnut Grove, Lakehills, Timberwood Park, Leon Springs, Bandera Falls, The Dominion, Kreutzberg, Pipe Creek, Welfare, Nelson City, Kronkosky State Natural Area, Bergheim, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Grey Forest, and San Geronimo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Bandera; Bexar; Comal; Kendall; Kerr; Medina
